## Data  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 103, 675, 529]]<|/det|>
speed of light in free space, \(c = 3.00\times 10^{8}\mathrm{m s}^{- 1}\) permeability of free space, \(\mu_{0} = 4\pi \times 10^{- 7}\mathrm{Hm}^{- 1}\) permittivity of free space, \(\epsilon_{0} = 8.85\times 10^{- 12}\mathrm{Fm}^{- 1}\) elementary charge, \(e = 1.60\times 10^{- 19}\mathrm{C}\) the Planck constant, \(h = 6.63\times 10^{- 34}\mathrm{Js}\) unified atomic mass constant, \(u = 1.66\times 10^{- 27}\mathrm{kg}\) rest mass of electron, \(m_{\mathrm{e}} = 9.11\times 10^{- 31}\mathrm{kg}\) rest mass of proton, \(m_{\mathrm{p}} = 1.67\times 10^{- 27}\mathrm{kg}\) molar gas constant, \(R = 8.31\mathrm{JK}^{- 1}\mathrm{mol}^{- 1}\) the Avogadro constant, \(N_{\mathrm{A}} = 6.02\times 10^{23}\mathrm{mol}^{- 1}\) the Boltzmann constant, \(k = 1.38\times 10^{- 23}\mathrm{JK}^{- 1}\) gravitational constant, \(G = 6.67\times 10^{- 11}\mathrm{Nm}^{2}\mathrm{kg}^{- 2}\) acceleration of free fall, \(g = 9.81\mathrm{m s}^{- 2}\)

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[440, 108, 559, 145]]<|/det|>
\[s = ut + \frac{1}{2} at^{2}\] \[\nu^{2} = u^{2} + 2as\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[440, 163, 526, 180]]<|/det|>
\[W = \rho \Delta V\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[447, 195, 537, 225]]<|/det|>
\[\phi = -\frac{Gm}{r}\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[447, 235, 522, 252]]<|/det|>
\[p = \rho gh\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[447, 262, 571, 295]]<|/det|>
\[p = \frac{1}{3}\frac{Nm}{V} < c^2 >\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[447, 304, 536, 321]]<|/det|>
\[a = -\omega^2 x\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[447, 339, 608, 375]]<|/det|>
\[\nu = \nu_{0}\cos \omega t\] \[\nu = \pm \omega \sqrt{(\chi_{0}^{2} - \chi^{2})}\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[447, 384, 537, 418]]<|/det|>
\[V = \frac{Q}{4\pi\epsilon_{0}r}\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[428, 426, 625, 445]]<|/det|>
\[1 / C = 1 / C_{1} + 1 / C_{2} + \ldots\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[447, 459, 593, 477]]<|/det|>
\[C = C_{1} + C_{2} + \ldots\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[440, 490, 528, 514]]<|/det|>
\[W = \frac{1}{2} QV\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[440, 526, 593, 546]]<|/det|>
\[R = R_{1} + R_{2} + \ldots\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[428, 560, 625, 579]]<|/det|>
\[1 / R = 1 / R_{1} + 1 / R_{2} + \ldots\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[447, 593, 561, 612]]<|/det|>
\[x = x_{0}\sin \omega t\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[447, 628, 581, 647]]<|/det|>
\[x = x_{0}\exp (-\lambda t)\]  

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[447, 656, 536, 689]]<|/det|>
\[\lambda = \frac{0.693}{t_{\frac{1}{2}}}\]

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[453, 72, 544, 90]]<|/det|>
## Section A

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 241, 751, 260]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 257, 752, 276]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 288, 871, 306]]<|/det|>
similarity: ..........................................................................................................................

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 350, 871, 368]]<|/det|>

<label>(c)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 469, 808, 488]]<|/det|>
Two protons are isolated in space. Their centres are separated by a distance \(R\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 484, 725, 502]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 498, 460, 517]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[522, 732, 876, 751]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 416, 744, 437]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 432, 828, 452]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 447, 828, 467]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 195, 875, 214]]<|/det|>
An electron is accelerated in a vacuum from rest through a potential difference of \(850\mathrm{V}\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 227, 180, 246]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 227, 717, 246]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[848, 412, 876, 431]]<|/det|>
